law.catch_line: Unless the facilitator has complied with this subtitle, a facilitator, or an officer, agent, employe...
law.text:
Unless the facilitator has complied with this subtitle, a facilitator, or an officer, agent, employee, or representative of a facilitator, individually or in conjunction or cooperation with another person, may not:
Solicit the execution of, process, receive, or accept an application or agreement for a refund anticipation loan or refund anticipation check; or
Facilitate the making of a refund anticipation loan or refund anticipation check.
